### **Sustainability Week Kit**

#### **You can only solve what you understand!**

‍

This section is dedicated to several useful tools to train yourselves & your colleagues or teams on sustainability topics. For each topic we have selected:

‍ **Videos** to watch. They are short and go straight to the point, making them ideal to watch during a lunch break, a zoom relax-time all together or during free times whenever you want.

‍ **Articles** to read to better grasp the problem.

‍ **Workshops & Activities** to engage your colleagues. **‍**

**Quick-win Actions** to implement in your company. Quick-wins may not have a huge overall impact but are easy steps to implement to show results and win colleagues' support for further impactful steps.

Topic: Fashion & Sustainability

#### **10% of the world's GHG emissions come from the fashion industry. Understanding how our fashion choices could be contributing**

#### **to climate change, and what we can do to reverse this, is therefore of utmost importance.**

‍

Want to host a sustainable week on the subject? We have prepared a comprehensive guide to introduce the problems and solutions, with a daily agenda for you to conduct your very own sustainable fashion week! Dowload the Guide or choose from the "a la carte" menu below!

‍

**Videos:**

- [Singaporeans Embrace Clothes Swapping To Combat Fashion Waste](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdrIdDYq2_E) \- Video by SCMP (3min.) _"Illustrates an alternative to fast fashion"_
- [The True Cost of Fast Fashion](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tLfNUD0-8ts) \- Video by The Economist (7min.) _“Short & comprehensive on how fast fashion is tackled”_
- [Unravel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOOI5LbQ9B8) \- Short documentary by Aeon Video (13 min.)  _"Short and lighter. About waste and consumerism"_
- [SHEIN, AliExpress, Zaful haul: Toxic chemicals found in some clothes (Marketplace)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQdonJ8yE1k) \- Video by CBC News (18min.) _"Highlights how our day-to-day brands are contributing to the issue"_
- [The Clothes We Wear](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-64wZkdPRew) \- Documentary by DW Documentary (28 min.)  _"Long but comprehensive explanation of the direct environmental effects of textile production"_

- [The Ugly Truth about Fast Fashion - Patriot Act with Hasan Minhaj](https://youtu.be/xGF3ObOBbac) \- Video by The Patriot Act  (29 min.) _"Entertaining, casual and comprehensive"_

‍

‍ **Articles:**

- [What Is Fast Fashion, Anyway?](https://www.thegoodtrade.com/features/what-is-fast-fashion) \- The Good Trade _"Comprehensive, straight to the point, provides historical context"_

- [What is greenwashing?](https://www.sustain.life/blog/what-is-greenwashing) \- Sustain.Life _"Explains what is another issue coming out of fast fashion"_
- [How fast fashion is destroying the planet](https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/03/books/review/how-fast-fashion-is-destroying-the-planet.html) – The New York Times _"Comprehensive in language but slightly more complex issues explained"_

- [Why Fashion Needs to Be More Sustainable](https://news.climate.columbia.edu/2021/06/10/why-fashion-needs-to-be-more-sustainable/) \- Columbia Climate School _"With solutions proposed"_
- [Vogue’s ultimate guide to sustainable fashion](https://vogue.sg/vogues-ultimate-guide-to-sustainable-fashion/) \- Vogue Singapore _"Comprehensive tips and recommendations to shop more sustainably"_
